1.title: Chickoo❤️
1.desc: I can’t find the right words to say how much I LOVE YOU. I LOVE YOU more than words can say. 💖

2.title: My heart ❤️
2.desc: You have been a blessing to me for a long time. You’re the gift  I never thought I could ask for. Thank you for the love you have shown me. It’s more than I could have ever dreamed

3.title: Kiddo💗
3.desc: A little peek at your face or hearing your sweet voice makes my day go better. That’s why I LOVE YOU so much! You are my lucky charm!

4.title: Best person 💘
4.desc: In the dark when I was hiding all of my feelings and insecurities, you came and saved me. I LOVE YOU for everything you do

5.title: Rabbit 😁
5.desc: If I could give you one thing in life, I'd give you the ability to see yourself through my eyes, only then would you realize how special you are to me

6.title: Mine favourite 😍❤️🖤
6.desc: If loving you was a job, I'd be the most deserving, dedicated, and qualified candidate but currently I am a CA aspirant😂❤️
